1.1.name: wordpress/wp-simple-captcha
1.1.description: This plugin add a simple math captcha to comment form.no javascript,no css included,just some php code.should just stop robot spammers. just add all php codes to your theme's function.php will do the work too.visit http://html5beta.com/wordpress/wp-simple-captcha/ for more info.
